code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'./About.css';import team from'../../images/about/team.jpg';import{translations}from'../../translations';import{useLanguage}from'../languageContext/laguageContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{const{language}=useLanguage();const t=translations[language].about;const sectionRef=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{const el=sectionRef.current;if(!el)return;const parts=Array.from(el.querySelectorAll('.about__animate'));const io=new IntersectionObserver(entries=>{entries.forEach(entry=>{if(entry.isIntersecting){entry.target.classList.add('is-visible');io.unobserve(entry.target);}});},{threshold:0.2});parts.forEach(p=>io.observe(p));return()=>io.disconnect();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{ref:sectionRef,id:"about",className:"about","aria-labelledby":"about-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about__line about__animate","aria-hidden":"true"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about__textwrap about__animate",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"about-title",className:"about__title",children:t.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about__text",children:t.text})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about__right about__animate",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:team,alt:"Echipa noastr\u0103",className:"about__image",loading:"lazy"})})]})});};export default About;
